title: Introduction
description: Getting started with migrating from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit
content: This section provides an overview of the migration process from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit in the sails-vvl-device-details-app repo.

title: Base Knowledge
description: Fundamental concepts for migrating from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit
content: Learn about the key differences between Redux Saga and Redux Toolkit, and why migrating can be beneficial for your project.

title: Steps of Migration
description: A step-by-step guide for migrating from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit
content: This section outlines the general steps involved in migrating your project from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit.

title: Structure Overview
description: Understanding the new structure after migration
content: Get an overview of how your project structure will change after migrating from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit.

title: Hands on VVL
description: Practical implementation of the migration process
content: This section provides hands-on guidance for migrating the sails-vvl-device-details-app from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit.

title: API Migration
description: Migrating API calls from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit
content: Learn how to migrate your API calls from Redux Saga to Redux Toolkit's createAsyncThunk.

title: Forming the API
description: Creating API slices with Redux Toolkit
content: Understand how to create API slices using Redux Toolkit's createApi function.

title: Using the API
description: Implementing the new API in your components
content: Learn how to use the newly created API slices in your React components.

title: Saga to Listeners
description: Converting Redux Saga effects to Redux Toolkit listeners
content: This section guides you through the process of converting your Redux Saga effects to Redux Toolkit's listener middleware.

title: Updating the Selectors
description: Adapting selectors for use with Redux Toolkit
content: Learn how to update your selectors to work with the new Redux Toolkit state structure.

title: Components Separation
description: Refactoring components for better separation of concerns
content: This section covers how to separate your components for better maintainability after migrating to Redux Toolkit.

title: Standalone Component
description: Creating standalone components with Redux Toolkit
content: Learn how to create standalone components that interact with Redux Toolkit slices.

title: Shared Components
description: Developing shared components for use across the application
content: Understand how to create and use shared components that work with Redux Toolkit state management.

title: Code Reviewing & Testing
description: Testing strategies for Redux Toolkit implementation
content: This section covers testing strategies for your newly migrated Redux Toolkit code, including both unit testing and integration testing approaches.
